meanings.sent1: The winier bottle of wine was more flavorful than the first one.
meanings.sent2: This winier wine pairs perfectly with the steak.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a winier wine could make me dance like this!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a winier wine, bubbling and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The winier wine tasted like a burst of sunshine in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: She had a winier smile when she crossed the finish line first.

meanings.sent3: His winier victory dance made everyone laugh and cheer.
